name: Metric
description: Stores precomputed aggregated analytic data for an entity.

children.name: dimensions
children.description: All group by clauses used to calculate the metric.

children.name: export_window
children.description: Export window for which the metric was exported.

children.name: first_seen
children.description: Timestamp of the first time the entity was seen in the environment.

children.name: last_seen
children.description: Timestamp of the last time the entity was seen in the environment.

children.name: sum_measure
children.description: Sum of all precomputed measures for the given metric.

children.name: total_events
children.description: Total number of events used to calculate the given precomputed metric.
